content:
CoreId: CORE-CG0151/54
Version: '1'
Authority:
    Organization: CDISC
Description: Trigger error if USUBJID is not unique
Sensitivity: Study
testing
Scopes:
    Standards:
        - Name: SDTMIG
          Version: '3.4'
          Domains:
              Include:
                  - DM
          Origin: SDTM Conformance Rules
          Version: '2.0'
          Id: CG0151
        - Name: ADaMIG
          Version: '1.2'
          Structure Group:
              Include:
                  - ADSL
          Origin: ADaM Conformance Rules
          Version: '3.0'
          Id: 54
Rule Type:
    Example: 
        Check:
            all:  
                - name: count(distinct(STUDYID, USUBJID))
                  operator: "greater_than"
                  value: 1
Outcome:
    Message: USUBJID is not unique within study
Citations:
    - Document: IG v3.4
      Section: 5.2
      Item: Specification
      Cited Guidance: >-
        Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.

Post-deploy update
